title: Torch for Wear
summary: This app consist in a simple torch built for smartwatch!
description: This app is designed for Android Wear, it won't work on different os.It allows you to light up with your watch in few seconds!INSTRUCTIONS FOR INSTALLATION:1 - Connect your smartphone with a smartwatch;2 - Download the app, and in a few seconds the app will be automatically installed In the SmartWatch ;It will works perfectly on you Android Wear!
descriptionHTML:
This app is designed for Android Wear, it won't work on different os.

It allows you to light up with your watch in few seconds!

INSTRUCTIONS FOR INSTALLATION:
1 - Connect your smartphone with a smartwatch;
2 - Download the app, and in a few seconds the app will be automatically installed In the SmartWatch ;

It will works perfectly on you Android Wear!
